title: Miser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to astrally give an Omen to. If you attempt to give it to a REF role, you are informed they are an REF and they do not receive it (sees past frames).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players will be informed they have an omen.
- After a player with an Omen participates in hanging a town player, they can no longer perform actions at night out of guilt.
- After a player with an Omen hangs two REF players, they lose the Omen.
- When a good player with an Omen is hanged, a random good player who voted for them is roleblocked the next night.
- When you are hanged during the day, all players lose their Omens. This does not happen if you die at night.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: See a player with an Omen hang a town member.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4478
*The mayor was paralyzed in fear as a ghastly man covered in chains slowly phased through the front door of her estate. The ghost stared blankly at the ground, but slowly his gaze began to rise until he locked eyes with the mayor. Horrible images appeared in the translucent eyes of the ghost: wailing ghouls, hell-fire, and frail corpses were encased in a snowy land of suffering. When she looked long enough into his eyes, she saw a familiar figure among the wailing ghouls, one with a top hat and familiar black suit.*
